creator: joerg.buchberger@pruftechnik-rv.com
text:
AFAIK, you are using pcli (of PVCS VM) for executing the task operations.

IMO, it would be nicer if this is documented on the description page.
If anything doesn't work like expected, one can easily look up more information
within the PVCS-PCLI-Documentation.

The third sentence of the paragraph headed "Introduction" says, "Before using
this tag, the user running ant must have access to the commands of PVCS (get and
pcli) and must have access to the repository."  Perhaps we could mention this
separately with the other optional task dependencies?
